title: Cumberland sausage roll slice
ingredients: ["18 quail's eggs", '650g cumberland sausages skinned', '1 small onion, grated', '1 bramley apple peeled and grated', 'small bunch of flat leaf parsley chopped', 'shake of tabasco', '1cm thick slice of good ham cut into small chunks', '50g fresh breadcrumbs', '500g puff pastry', '1 egg, beaten']
